Error Controller

Extend this class to handle Application Level errors (all thrown exceptions across your whole application). Unlike controllers (where you register multiple), you can register only one class extending ErrorController. This link explains you why single error controller. List of properties which are available

request: Express.Request
Expressjs request object is mapped to this.request property.
response: Express.Response
Expressjs response object is mapped to this.response property.
next: Express.NextFunction
Expressjs next handler is mapped to this.next property.
error: Error
Placeholder for unhandled error thrown by application.
internalServerError()

Gets executed when any unhandled error thrown by application. This is an appropriate place to put your global error handling logic. 


        

        
    
            
  • 
                internalServerError() is an abstract method on ErrorController which has to be implemented.
